name: Heart of the Labyrinth
description: You're standing in a circular area. It's a dead end. You turn around and find that even the passage that brought you here is gone! In the center of the circular area there is a black, stone pedestal. It's a smooth cylindrical column about a foot in diameter and four feet tall. It's engraved with writing that circles it, spiraling a message around and around from top to bottom.

args: You step through the passage to the north. When you check behind you, the way back is gone--there's just a dead end. The passage leads straight in front of you and only heads about fifteen feet before opening to another area. You continue on.

features.roomDesc: Sitting atop the pedestal is a small rune.
features.look: It's a magical rune representing lievnu.
take: You take the rune from atop the pedestal.
You look around again only to find a new passage to the north.

look: ]ATOP THE LONELY SENTINEL\WHOSE CROWN IS ALL AFLAME\USE IT ON THE DERVISH\ITS POWER YOU RECLAIM

features.roomDesc: A single passage leads away from the area to the north.
